channel.title: Please help!
channel.description:
REPOST (since there were a million easy questions that bumped mine off the page -.-)
Hey dose anyone know how to make it so when a player kills an npc it gives that player an item?
Also how to make it so when you drop that item it dissapears.
ps: Sorry for the title noone helps unless its something stupid :|.

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @dedripper dedripper
item.description:
@dedripper wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:2, topic:164525”]In npcHandler.java when the npcs dies, p.addItem(#,#);

–
Make a string…

public int UnDroppable[] = {id,id,id,id,id,id,id,id}; Etc…

case 87. Drop item…

Add…
int ItemDropped = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

Then… Underneath all your ints.

                            if(isUnDroppable(ItemDropped)) {
                            sendMessage("You drop the "+getItemName(ItemDropped)+", it's vanished!");
                            deleteItem(ItemDropped, slot, playerItemsN[slot]);
                            }[/quote]

thanks greatly appricieated!

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

In npcHandler.java when the npcs dies, p.addItem(#,#);

–
Make a string…

public int UnDroppable[] = {id,id,id,id,id,id,id,id}; Etc…

case 87. Drop item…

Add…
int ItemDropped = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

Then… Underneath all your ints.

                            if(isUnDroppable(ItemDropped)) {
                            sendMessage("You drop the "+getItemName(ItemDropped)+", it's vanished!");
                            deleteItem(ItemDropped, slot, playerItemsN[slot]);
